title: "Indeed Selects AWS as Its Preferred Cloud to Drive Efficiencies across its Global Operations"
excerpt: "Indeed is leveraging the breadth and depth of AWS services, including analytics, machine learning, managed databases, compute, storage, serverless, security, and data warehousing, to accelerate innovation of new customer-facing products and services while reducing development costs for those products by more than 20%."
